parameters.name: Async
parameters.description:
Indicates whether to use an asynchronous link to submit job files.

Default value: false.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the E-HPC cluster.

You can call the [ListClusters](~~87116~~) operation to query the cluster ID.

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The content of the job file. The content is encoded in Base64.

parameters.name: RunasUser
parameters.description:
The user to which the job file belongs.

You can call the [ListUsers](~~188572~~) operation to query the users of the cluster.

parameters.name: TargetFile
parameters.description: The name of the job file.
